capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed pure-blood wizarding heritage. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's been well-documented in the wizarding world.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and it's no surprise given her family's long history of producing talented wizards. I completely agree that being a pure-blood wizard has its advantages, but it also comes with a lot of pressure to live up to expectations.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is an amazing teacher and mentor. I mean, who else can make Transfiguration look so cool? She's always been a role model for me, and I really admire her strength and leadership skills.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never met a female before, so this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is a fantastic role model in the Harry Potter series. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible teacher at Hogwarts. Her no-nonsense attitude and sharp wit always keep me on my toes. And let's not forget her bravery - she's always willing to stand up for what's right, even if it means putting herself in harm's way.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria, what is the typical age range of a mcgonagall?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She's been a part of the wizarding world for so long, and yet she still manages to be so youthful and vibrant. I'm CONFIRM, certain that she'll always be a role model for young witches and wizards everywhere.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with confidence.
